availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel G. Dalton (Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Susan C. Dalton. Father of Lula A. Dalton, Mary S. Dalton, and Nattie S. Dalton.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Tharps district, p. 143. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Laceloveville District, p. 22. Find A Grave, "Daniel Gilbert Dalton (1834-1914)," Memorial #19582316, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=19582316&ref=acom (accessed September 12, 2017).
